snippet: Takashi Fujimoto, who sustained an electric shock and a minor stroke as Hurricane Sandy battered his home on Staten Island, is thankful for the “angels and heroes” who have helped him.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Takashi Fujimoto of Staten Island buy winter jacket and clothes to replace those he lost during Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Takashi Fujimoto, who sustained an electric shock and a minor stroke as Hurricane Sandy battered his home on Staten Island, is thankful for the “angels and heroes” who have helped him.

headline.print_headline: After Hurricane Sandy Wreaked Havoc, A Changed Perspective
